author: abroekhuis
msg: CELIX-76: Added string terminators to newly allocated string. Removed realloc usage which doesn't work in combination with apr_palloc. Note: Now the memory is increased by allocating a new block, but since the pool is destroyed shortly after usage I don't think this is a problem.

author: sarowe
msg: Intellij config: JDK setup: look for ${idea.jdk} property in the local lucene/build.properties first, before looking in the files under ${user.home} (merged trunk r1524906)

author: sarowe
msg: Intellij config: JDK setup: look for ${idea.jdk} property in the local lucene/build.properties first, before looking in the files under ${user.home}

author: sarowe
msg: Intellij config: JDK setup: add missing interpolation marker in dev-tools/idea/.idea/misc.xml; dont print out follow-on instructions if ${idea.jdk} is defined; and when follow-on instructions are printed, show how to avoid the need to manually configure the JDK. (merged trunk r1524903)
